author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct numbering scheme for ECAL for dd4hep application. It only allows the step2 job to proceed before getting segfault by the tracker code

#### PR validation:

Tested with examples in SimG4Core/Configuration

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex16 Correct numbering scheme for ECAL
